backup-read-bytes.name: backup-read-bytes
backup-read-bytes.desc: The number of bytes read from disk for backups.

backup-read-load.name: backup-read-load
backup-read-load.desc: The moving average of the read load on the backup, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.

backup-read-rate.name: backup-read-rate
backup-read-rate.desc: The moving average of reading backup data from disk, in megabytes per second.

backup-read-time.name: backup-read-time
backup-read-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read data for backups.

backup-write-bytes.name: backup-write-bytes
backup-write-bytes.desc: The number of bytes written to disk for backups.

backup-write-load.name: backup-write-load
backup-write-load.desc: The moving average of the load for writing for backups, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the threads writing on the host.

backup-write-rate.name: backup-write-rate
backup-write-rate.desc: The moving average of writing data for backups, in megabytes per second.

backup-write-time.name: backup-write-time
backup-write-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to write data to backups.

core-threads.name: core-threads
core-threads.desc: A count of total core threads.

data-dir-space.name: data-dir-space
data-dir-space.desc: The number of MB left on data dir.

deadlock-count.name: deadlock-count
deadlock-count.desc: The number of deadlocks, summed across all forests on the host.

deadlock-rate.name: deadlock-rate
deadlock-rate.desc: The rate of taking write locks, summed across all forests on the host.

deadlock-wait-load.name: deadlock-wait-load
deadlock-wait-load.desc: The deadlock wait load, summed across all forests on the host.

external-binary-read-bytes.name: external-binary-read-bytes
external-binary-read-bytes.desc: The number of bytes read from external binary documents.

external-binary-read-load.name: external-binary-read-load
external-binary-read-load.desc: The moving average of the read load on external binary documents, in seconds per second.

external-binary-read-rate.name: external-binary-read-rate
external-binary-read-rate.desc: The moving average of reading external binary documents from disk, in megabytes per second.

external-binary-read-time.name: external-binary-read-time
external-binary-read-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read data from external binary documents.

foreign-xdqp-client-receive-bytes.name: foreign-xdqp-client-receive-bytes
foreign-xdqp-client-receive-bytes.desc: The number of bytes received by the xdqp client for host communications.

foreign-xdqp-client-receive-load.name: foreign-xdqp-client-receive-load
foreign-xdqp-client-receive-load.desc: The moving average of the receive load for the xdqp client, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.

foreign-xdqp-client-receive-rate.name: foreign-xdqp-client-receive-rate
foreign-xdqp-client-receive-rate.desc: The moving average of receiving xdqp client messages, in megabytes per second.

foreign-xdqp-client-receive-time.name: foreign-xdqp-client-receive-time
foreign-xdqp-client-receive-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to receive xdqp client communication.

foreign-xdqp-client-send-bytes.name: foreign-xdqp-client-send-bytes
foreign-xdqp-client-send-bytes.desc: The number of bytes sent by the xdqp client for host communications.

foreign-xdqp-client-send-load.name: foreign-xdqp-client-send-load
foreign-xdqp-client-send-load.desc: The moving average of the send load for the xdqp client, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.

foreign-xdqp-client-send-rate.name: foreign-xdqp-client-send-rate
foreign-xdqp-client-send-rate.desc: The moving average of sending xdqp client messages, in megabytes per second.

foreign-xdqp-client-send-time.name: foreign-xdqp-client-send-time
foreign-xdqp-client-send-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to send xdqp client communication.

foreign-xdqp-server-receive-bytes.name: foreign-xdqp-server-receive-bytes
foreign-xdqp-server-receive-bytes.desc: The number of bytes received by the xdqp server for host communications.

foreign-xdqp-server-receive-load.name: foreign-xdqp-server-receive-load
foreign-xdqp-server-receive-load.desc: The moving average of the receive load for the xdqp server, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.

foreign-xdqp-server-receive-rate.name: foreign-xdqp-server-receive-rate
foreign-xdqp-server-receive-rate.desc: The moving average of receiving xdqp server messages, in megabytes per second.

foreign-xdqp-server-receive-time.name: foreign-xdqp-server-receive-time
foreign-xdqp-server-receive-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to receive xdqp server communication.

foreign-xdqp-server-send-bytes.name: foreign-xdqp-server-send-bytes
foreign-xdqp-server-send-bytes.desc: The number of bytes sent by the xdqp server for host communications.

foreign-xdqp-server-send-load.name: foreign-xdqp-server-send-load
foreign-xdqp-server-send-load.desc: The moving average of the send load for the xdqp server, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.

foreign-xdqp-server-send-rate.name: foreign-xdqp-server-send-rate
foreign-xdqp-server-send-rate.desc: The moving average of sending xdqp server messages, in megabytes per second.

foreign-xdqp-server-send-time.name: foreign-xdqp-server-send-time
foreign-xdqp-server-send-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to send xdqp server communication.

host-large-data-size.name: host-large-data-size
host-large-data-size.desc: The total size of all large binary data on the host.

host-size.name: host-size
host-size.desc: The total data size of all forests on the host. The size is calculated by adding the fast data directory size and the data directory size for each forest on this host, but it does not include any content stored in the large data directory.

journal-write-bytes.name: journal-write-bytes
journal-write-bytes.desc: The number of bytes written to the journal on disk.

journal-write-load.name: journal-write-load
journal-write-load.desc: The moving average of the load for writing to the journal, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the threads writing on the host.

journal-write-rate.name: journal-write-rate
journal-write-rate.desc: The moving average of writing data to the journal, in megabytes per second.

journal-write-time.name: journal-write-time
journal-write-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to write data to the journal.

large-read-bytes.name: large-read-bytes
large-read-bytes.desc: The number of bytes read from large documents.

large-read-load.name: large-read-load
large-read-load.desc: The moving average of the read load on large documents, in seconds per second.

large-read-rate.name: large-read-rate
large-read-rate.desc: The moving average of reading large documents from disk, in megabytes per second.

large-read-time.name: large-read-time
large-read-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read data from large documents.

large-write-bytes.name: large-write-bytes
large-write-bytes.desc: The number of bytes written to disk for large documents.

large-write-load.name: large-write-load
large-write-load.desc: The moving average of the load for writing for large documents, in seconds per second.

large-write-rate.name: large-write-rate
large-write-rate.desc: The moving average of writing data for large documents, in megabytes per second.

large-write-time.name: large-write-time
large-write-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to write data for large documents.

log-device-space.name: log-device-space
log-device-space.desc: The number of MB left on log device.

memory-process-anon.name: memory-process-anon
memory-process-anon.desc: The number of MB of Process Anonymous Memory for the MarkLogic process.

memory-process-rss.name: memory-process-rss
memory-process-rss.desc: The number of MB of Process Resident Size (RSS) for the MarkLogic process.

memory-process-rss-hwm.name: memory-process-rss-hwm
memory-process-rss-hwm.desc: The mazimum (High Water Mark) of Process Resident Size (RSS) in MB for the MarkLogic process.

memory-process-size.name: memory-process-size
memory-process-size.desc: The number of MB of total process virtual memory for the MarkLogic process.

memory-process-swap-size.name: memory-process-swap-size
memory-process-swap-size.desc: The number of MB of memory swapped out for the MarkLogic process.

memory-system-pagein-rate.name: memory-system-pagein-rate
memory-system-pagein-rate.desc: The page in rate for the system in pages/sec.

memory-system-pageout-rate.name: memory-system-pageout-rate
memory-system-pageout-rate.desc: The page out rate for the system in pages/sec.

memory-system-swapin-rate.name: memory-system-swapin-rate
memory-system-swapin-rate.desc: The swap in rate for the system in pages/sec.

memory-system-swapout-rate.name: memory-system-swapout-rate
memory-system-swapout-rate.desc: The swap out rate for the system in pages/sec.

merge-read-bytes.desc: The number of bytes read during merges.

merge-read-load.name: merge-read-load
merge-read-load.desc: The moving average of the read load on the merge, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.

merge-read-rate.name: merge-read-rate
merge-read-rate.desc: The moving average of reading merge data from disk, in megabytes per second.

merge-read-time.name: merge-read-time
merge-read-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read data for merges.

merge-write-bytes.name: merge-write-bytes
merge-write-bytes.desc: The number of bytes written to disk for merges.

merge-write-load.name: merge-write-load
merge-write-load.desc: The moving average of the load for writing for merges, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the threads writing on the host.

merge-write-rate.name: merge-write-rate
merge-write-rate.desc: The moving average of writing data for merges, in megabytes per second.

merge-write-time.name: merge-write-time
merge-write-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to write data for merges.

query-read-bytes.name: query-read-bytes

query-read-load.name: query-read-load
query-read-load.desc: The moving average of the read load on the query, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.

query-read-rate.name: query-read-rate

query-read-time.name: query-read-time
query-read-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read query data from disk.

read-lock-count.name: read-lock-count
read-lock-count.desc: The total number of read locks, summed across all forests on the host.

read-lock-rate.desc: The rate of taking read locks, summed across all forests on the host.

read-lock-wait-load.desc: The read lock wait load, summed across all forests on the host.

restore-read-load.desc: The moving average of the read load on the backup, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.

restore-write-time.name: restore-write-time
restore-write-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to write data for restores.

save-write-bytes.name: save-write-bytes
save-write-bytes.desc: The number of bytes written when saving in-memory stands.

save-write-load.name: save-write-load
save-write-load.desc: The moving average of the load for writing to in-memory stands, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the threads writing on the host.

save-write-rate.desc: The moving average of writing data to in-memory stands, in megabytes per second.

save-write-time.name: save-write-time
save-write-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) spent saving in-memory stands.

request-time.name: request-time
request-time.desc: average of request time for this server.

query-read-rate.name: query-read-rate
query-read-rate.desc: The moving average of reading query data from disk, in megabytes per second.

query-read-time.name: query-read-time
query-read-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read query data from disk.

read-lock-count.name: read-lock-count
read-lock-count.desc: The total number of read locks, summed across all forests on the host.

read-lock-hold-load.name: read-lock-hold-load
read-lock-hold-load.desc: The read lock hold load, summed across all forests on the host

read-lock-rate.name: read-lock-rate
read-lock-rate.desc: The rate of taking read locks, summed across all forests on the host.

read-lock-wait-load.name: read-lock-wait-load
read-lock-wait-load.desc: The read lock wait load, summed across all forests on the host.

restore-read-bytes.name: restore-read-bytes
restore-read-bytes.desc: The number of bytes read from disk for restores.

restore-read-load.name: restore-read-load
restore-read-load.desc: The moving average of the read load on the backup, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.

restore-read-rate.name: restore-read-rate
restore-read-rate.desc: The moving average of reading restore data from disk, in megabytes per second.

restore-read-time.name: restore-read-time
restore-read-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read data for restores.

restore-write-bytes.name: restore-write-bytes
restore-write-bytes.desc: The number of bytes written to disk for restores.

restore-write-load.name: restore-write-load
restore-write-load.desc: The moving average of the load for writing for restores, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the threads writing on the host.

restore-write-rate.name: restore-write-rate
restore-write-rate.desc: The moving average of writing data for restores, in megabytes per second.

restore-write-time.name: restore-write-time
restore-write-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to write data for restores.

save-write-bytes.name: save-write-bytes
save-write-bytes.desc: The number of bytes written when saving in-memory stands.

save-write-load.name: save-write-load
save-write-load.desc: The moving average of the load for writing to in-memory stands, in seconds per second. This is summed for all of the threads writing on the host.

save-write-rate.name: save-write-rate
save-write-rate.desc: The moving average of writing data to in-memory stands, in megabytes per second.

save-write-time.name: save-write-time
save-write-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) spent saving in-memory stands.

write-lock-hold-load.name: write-lock-hold-load
write-lock-hold-load.desc: The write lock hold load, summed across all forests on the host.

write-lock-rate.name: write-lock-rate
write-lock-rate.desc: The rate of taking read locks, summed across all forests on the host.

write-lock-wait-load.name: write-lock-wait-load
write-lock-wait-load.desc: The write lock wait load, summed across all forests on the host.

data-size.name: data-size
data-size.desc: The amount of space forest data files take up on disk.

database-replication-receive-bytes.name: database-replication-receive-bytes
database-replication-receive-bytes.desc: The number of bytes received for database replication.

database-replication-receive-load.name: database-replication-receive-load
database-replication-receive-load.desc: The moving average of the load for receiving data for database replication, in seconds per second.

database-replication-receive-rate.name: database-replication-receive-rate
database-replication-receive-rate.desc: The moving average of the rate for receiving data for database replication, in seconds per second.

database-replication-receive-time.name: database-replication-receive-time
database-replication-receive-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to receive data for database replication.

database-replication-send-bytes.name: database-replication-send-bytes
database-replication-send-bytes.desc: The number of bytes sent for database replication.

database-replication-send-load.name: database-replication-send-load
database-replication-send-load.desc: The moving average of the load for sending data for database replication, in seconds per second.

database-replication-send-rate.name: database-replication-send-rate
database-replication-send-rate.desc: The moving average of sending data for database replication, in megabytes per second.

database-replication-send-time.name: database-replication-send-time
database-replication-send-time.desc: The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to send data for database replication.

deadlock-rate.name: deadlock-rate
deadlock-rate.desc: The rate of taking write locks, summed across all forests on the host.

deadlock-wait-load.name: deadlock-wait-load
deadlock-wait-load.desc: The deadlock wait load, summed across all forests on the host.

fast-data-size.name: fast-data-size
fast-data-size.desc: The amount of space forest data files take up on fast disk.

large-data-size.name: large-data-size
large-data-size.desc: The amount of space large objects take up on disk.

large-device-space.name: large-device-space
large-device-space.desc: The amount of space left on large forest device.

read-lock-hold-load.name: read-lock-hold-load
read-lock-hold-load.desc: The read lock hold load, summed across all forests on the host

read-lock-rate.name: read-lock-rate
read-lock-rate.desc: The rate of taking read locks, summed across all forests on the host.

read-lock-wait-load.name: read-lock-wait-load
read-lock-wait-load.desc: The read lock wait load, summed across all forests on the host.

write-lock-hold-load.name: write-lock-hold-load
write-lock-hold-load.desc: The write lock hold load, summed across all forests on the host.

write-lock-rate.name: write-lock-rate
write-lock-rate.desc: The rate of taking read locks, summed across all forests on the host.

write-lock-wait-load.name: write-lock-wait-load
write-lock-wait-load.desc: The write lock wait load, summed across all forests on the host.
